original: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
analyzed: etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti

original: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
analyzed: etam kulam pana bahum puññam pasavati

original: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana passati yo koci
analyzed: etam kulam pana passati yaḥ koci

analyzed: etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci

original: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti

original: Etesaṃ kulānaṃ pana dhanaṃ dadanti dhanavantā

original: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
analyzed: etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti

original: Etasmiṃ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
analyzed: etasmin kulamhi pana me manaḥ ramati

original: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
analyzed: etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti

original: Ayaṃ jano pana taṃ purisaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti

original: Ime janā te purise puññaṃ kārāpenti
analyzed: ime janā te purise puññam kārāpenti
iminā janena yaḥ koci su carati

original: Ayaṃ kaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
analyzed: ayam kaññā pana bahum puññam pasavati

original: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci

original: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
analyzed: imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yaḥ koci

original: Imaṃ cittaṃ pana attano santānaṃ vijānāti
analyzed: imam cittam pana attanaḥ santānam vijānāti

original: Imassa cittassa ovādaṃ deti yo koci
analyzed: imassa cittassa ovādam deti yaḥ koci

analyzed: imesam cittānam ovādam denti ye keci

asmin citte a rakkhite kāya kammam a rakkhitam

original: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ toseti
analyzed: asu mahā rājā catuhi saṅgaha vatthūhi janam toseti

original: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
analyzed: amunā mahā rājena khalu pana mahā janaḥ su carati

original: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
analyzed: amūhi mahā rājehi kho pana mahā janaḥ su carati

original: Amusmiṃ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati

original: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.

original: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
analyzed: amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti

analyzed: adum dhanavam niccam bahum puññam pasavati

original: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṃ kodhassa gacchati;
analyzed: nāma budhaḥ loke vasam kodhassa gacchati

original: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
analyzed: ke hitvā mānusam deham dibbam yogam upaccagum

original: Kaṃsi tvaṃ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
analyzed: kaṃsi tvam assu uddissa pabbajitaḥ ca āvuso

original: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
analyzed: keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivam gatā

original: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto kuvaṃ sattassa kārako;
analyzed: kena ayam pakataḥ satto kuvam sattassa kārakaḥ

original: Kehidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
analyzed: kehi idam pakatam bimbam kvan nu bibbassa kārakaḥ

original: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
analyzed: kena te tādisaḥ vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati

original: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṃ rakkhanti devatā.
analyzed: kehi me puñña kammehi mamam rakkhanti devatā

original: Kesaṃ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: kesam divā ca sadā puññam pavaḍḍhati

original: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṃ.
analyzed: kehi nāma ariyehi puthagā iva janaḥ ayam

original: Kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāya vācaṃ bhasayi īdisaṃ;
analyzed: kassa tvam dhammam aññāya vācam īdisam

original: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
analyzed: kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhi muttamā

original: Kā ca suphassayaṃ dānaṃ mañcapīṭhādikaṃ adā;
analyzed: kā ca suphassayam dānam mañca pīṭha ādikam adā

original: Kāyo nānāvidhaṃ puññaṃ katvāna tidivaṃ gatā.
analyzed: kāyaḥ nānāvidham puññam katvāna tidivam gatā

original: Kaṃ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṃ sīlaṃ paripālayī;
analyzed: kam bhāvanam ca kam sīlam paripālayī

original: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
analyzed: kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko

original: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
analyzed: kāya upāsikā āyassu dhammaḥ ca sūyate sadā

original: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
analyzed: kāhi ca sīlavatīhi ca sūyate sadā

original: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṃ sukhaṃ;
analyzed: kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idam sukham

original: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṃ sukhaṃ.
analyzed: kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idam sukham

original: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
analyzed: kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahā nadī

original: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;

original: Kāsaṃ kho pana kaññānaṃ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
analyzed: kāsam kho pana kaññānam ābharaṇāḥ bhavanti ca

original: Kassaṃ nadiṃ pana macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā;

original: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā.
analyzed: kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccam vicaranti sadā

original: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;

original: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṃ jānema taṃ mayaṃ.
analyzed: kāni cittāni jāyanti katham jānema tam mayam

original: Kiṃ tvaṃ attavasaṃ disvā mama dajjāsimaṃ dhanaṃ;

original: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
analyzed: kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivam gatā

original: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṃ kannu yocasi;

original: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṃ saddho yajati gotamaṃ.
analyzed: kehi pupphehi sakkaccam saddhaḥ yajati gotamam

original: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ iti rājā apucchitaṃ;

original: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.

original: Kasmiṃ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ;

original: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṃ so sakhāhitoti.

atha aliṅga tumha amha saddāḥ vuccante

original: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṃ uppajjati

analyzed: tayi citte kho pana kusala cittam patiṭhitam

original: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;

original: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.

original: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;

original: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṃ rathā
